headline: Taser Maker Axon Soars On Uplifting Guidance After Trump Election
summary: Taser maker Axon Enterprises guided high late Thursday after smashing earnings estimates for the third quarter.  Heading into the Nov. 5 election, analysts also saw Axon stock as a potential beneficiary of a Trump win.  Former President Donald Trump survived an assassination attempt in July to win the election this week.

headline: This Taser Maker’s Stock Is Today’s Best S&P 500 Performer. Here’s Why.
summary: Shares of  Axon Enterprise  were trading sharply higher after the taser maker tore past quarterly earnings estimates.  Axon stock rose 21% to $569 in Friday trading and was on track for an all-time high, according to Dow Jones Market Data.  It also was the top performer in the  in Friday’s session.

headline: Axon, Taser Maker And Trump Stock, Soars On Uplifting Guidance
summary: Taser maker Axon Enterprises guided high late Thursday after smashing earnings estimates for the third quarter. Axon stock rocketed on Friday amid a slew of price-target hikes. Heading into the Nov. 5 election, analysts also saw Axon stock as a potential Trump stock winner.
